paper_metadata.title: Clinical and genetic characterization of hereditary breast cancer in a Chinese population
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 120 patients with breast cancer, median age 46 years

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the breast cancer group 9 (7.5%) BRCA2 variants were identified.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift deletion leading to a likely pathogenic effect.

variants.additional_notes: Identified in patients with invasive ductal carcinoma.
key_quotes: In the breast cancer group 9 (7.5%) BRCA2 variants were identified.
